Title: Exempts a debtor's interest in his or her rent-stabilized lease from bankruptcy proceedings
Summary: Exempts a debtor's interest in his or her rent-stabilized lease from bankruptcy proceedings.
LawCode: Amd ยง282, D & C L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the debtor and creditor law, in relation to exempting a debtor's interest in his or her rent-stabilized lease from bankruptcy proceedings
